Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class ClientCli

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.ClientCli
All Implemented Interfaces:
View, Runnable
public class ClientCli extends Object implements Runnable, View
This is the main view class which manages the CLI graphics' operations.
Author:
Riccardo Milici, Riccardo Motta, Matteo Negro
